scripts.secrets:linux: echo Enter Bitwarden Password: && read BW_PASSWORD && (bw logout || exit 0) && export BW_SESSION=`bw login product@bitsofgood.org $BW_PASSWORD --raw` && npm run secrets:get
scripts.secrets:windows: set /p BW_PASSWORD=Enter Bitwarden Password:&& (bw logout || VER>NUL) && npm run secrets:login
scripts.secrets:login: FOR /F %a IN ('bw login product@bitsofgood.org %BW_PASSWORD% --raw') DO SET BW_SESSION=%a && npm run secrets:get
scripts.secrets:get: bw sync && bw get item Healing4Heroes/development/backend/.env | fx .notes > ".env" && bw get item Healing4Heroes/development/backend/firebase-service-account.json | fx .notes > "server/utils/firebase-service-account.json"
